page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This block covers a part of{East {Swansea}which affords some interesting contrasts.A large industrial complex rests cheek by jowl with an important natural wetland habitat.One of Britain's first enterprise zones occupies land which at one time held one of the country's greatest concentrations of non_ferrous metal industries .Old stone and slate terraced cottages in the village of LLansamlet;modern council estates in Bonymaen.The M4 motorway and the Railway line to London are two life lines for the area.Unemployment is high,with the single major employer, the BP Oil +Petro-Chemical refinery,announcing a reduction of 750 jobs by the end of 1986.Further development of the enterprise zone should ease the employment situation in the future.
